mapper.sql: goods.id as id , goods.goods_name as goodsName , goods.goods_short_name as goodsShortName , goods.goods_spu as goodsSpu , goods.goods_type as goodsType , goods.self_support as selfSupport , goods.goods_category_id as goodsCategoryId , goods.is_multi_properties as isMultiProperties , goods.sku_nums as skuNums , goods.sale_map as saleMap , goods.state as state , goods.is_delete as isDelete , goods.directly_org_id as directlyOrgId , goods.hierarchy_id as hierarchyId , goods.creator_id as creatorId , goods.creator as creator , goods.create_time as createTime , goods.updator_id as updatorId , goods.updator as updator , goods.update_time as updateTime , goods.extends_params as extendsParams , goods.remark1 as remark1 , goods.remark2 as remark2
mapper.insert:
insert into goods_tb
id,
goods_name,
goods_short_name,
goods_spu,
goods_type,
self_support,
goods_category_id,
is_multi_properties,
sku_nums,
sale_map,
state,
is_delete,
directly_org_id,
hierarchy_id,
creator_id,
creator,
create_time,
updator_id,
updator,
update_time,
extends_params,
remark1,
remark2,

#{goodsName},
#{goodsShortName},
#{goodsSpu},
#{goodsType},
#{selfSupport},
#{goodsCategoryId},

mapper.update:
update goods_tb
goods_name = #{goodsName},
goods_short_name = #{goodsShortName},
goods_spu = #{goodsSpu},
goods_type = #{goodsType},
self_support = #{selfSupport},
goods_category_id = #{goodsCategoryId},
is_multi_properties = #{isMultiProperties},
sku_nums = #{skuNums},
sale_map = #{saleMap},
state = #{state},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
directly_org_id = #{directlyOrgId},
hierarchy_id = #{hierarchyId},
creator_id = #{creatorId},
creator = #{creator},
create_time = #{createTime},
updator_id = #{updatorId},
updator = #{updator},
update_time = #{updateTime},
extends_params = #{extendsParams},
remark1 = #{remark1},
remark2 = #{remark2},
where id = #{id}
